definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: A fire burns in the cauldron, as a reminder of the Olympic flame.
sentences.chinese: 火炬塔里燃烧着一团火焰，让人想到奥林匹克圣火。

sentences.english: When Solomon offered up the temple, the holy fire once again came down from heaven.
sentences.chinese: 所罗门献殿之时，圣火再次从天而降。

sentences.english: The Olympic flame arrived in Sanya, Hainan, Saturday after going to Hong Kong and Macao.
sentences.chinese: 奥运圣火结束港澳传递后，5月3日晚抵达海南三亚。

sentences.english: He will light the cauldron with the torch and release white doves which symbolize peace.
sentences.chinese: 他会用圣火点燃圣火台，接著释放代表和平的白鸽。

sentences.english: He will light the cauldron with the torch and release white doves which symbolize peace.
sentences.chinese: 他会用圣火点燃圣火台，接著释放代表和平的白鸽。

sentences.english: Because there is Olympic flame shinning inside of us forever.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们心中永远燃烧着不灭圣火。

sentences.english: The relay will last 130 days, involving over 20,000 torchbearers.
sentences.chinese: 圣火传递将持续130天，包括2万名火炬手。

sentences.english: Pyros is expended to power Transmutations.
sentences.chinese: 消耗圣火可发动嬗变术。

sentences.english: In the program, everybody also again mentioned that Beijing Olympic Games opening ceremony ignites the ceremonial fire incident.
sentences.chinese: 节目中，大家又再提到北京奥运开幕式燃点圣火一事。

sentences.english: Is the Olympic Torch boycotted in your country?
sentences.chinese: 在您的国家有抵制奥运圣火的事件吗？

sentences.english: The holy fire from God spoke of God's presence and His acceptance.
sentences.chinese: 从神而来的圣火说到神的同在和祂的悦纳。

sentences.english: The Olympic torch starts its 3-day relay in Liaoning today.
sentences.chinese: 奥运圣火今日开始在辽宁进行为期3天的传递。

sentences.english: See the fire in the sky, we feel the beating of our hearts together.
sentences.chinese: 看圣火映红天空，我们感到心儿在一起跳动。

sentences.english: Flame is the light like a star in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 圣火在闪耀，如同天上星芒。

sentences.english: The fifth mascot is the brightly burning Olympic flame.
sentences.chinese: 第五个吉祥物是熊熊燃烧的奥运圣火。

sentences.english: Are you a supporter of the Olympic Torch going to Mt. Everest?
sentences.chinese: 您是否支持奥运圣火登珠峰？

definition: tinder/source of a fire/inflammable material/(fig.) spark (of a revolution etc)
occult force/the power of a God or spirit
fire and ice/combination of sharply contrasting or incompatible elements
Vermilion Bird (the seven mansions of the south sky)
the Eternal Wheel of life in Buddhism
